info.title: Commerce Admin REST endpoints - All inclusive
info.description: The schemas documented here are autogenerated from an instance of Adobe Commerce with B2B. Each schema represents a specific user role (Admin, Customer, and Guest) and determines which endpoints are accessible. Use the version switcher to select an Adobe Commerce version and corresponding API. You can also generate a local API reference based on your own Adobe Commerce configuration, which allows you to see API documentation for your specific Adobe Commerce modules, third-party modules, and extension attributes.

post.description: Decline the B2B quote. All custom pricing will be removed from this quote. The buyer will be able to place an order using their standard catalog prices and discounts.
Create a new empty B2B quote with NegotiableQuoteInterface::STATUS_DRAFT_BY_ADMIN status.

Refreshes item prices, taxes, discounts, cart rules in the negotiable quote as per the latest changes in the catalog / shared catalog and in the price rules. Depending on the negotiable quote state and totals, all or just some of quote numbers will be recalculated. 'Update Prices' parameter forces refresh on any quote that is not locked for admin user, including the quotes with a negotiated price. The request can be applied to one or more quotes at the same time.
Create a B2B quote based on a regular Magento quote. If the B2B quote requires a shipping address (for negotiation or tax calculations), add it to the regular quote before you create a B2B quote.
Submit the B2B quote to the customer. The quote status for the customer will be changed to 'Updated', and the customer can work with the quote.

post.description: Add or update product prices. Input item should correspond \Magento\Catalog\Api\Data\CostInterface. If any items will have invalid price, store id or sku, they will be marked as failed and excluded from update list and \Magento\Catalog\Api\Data\PriceUpdateResultInterface[] with problem description will be returned. If there were no failed items during update empty array will be returned. If error occurred during the update exception will be thrown.
Return product prices. In case of at least one of skus is not found exception will be thrown.

Add or update product cost. Input item should correspond to \Magento\Catalog\Api\Data\CostInterface. If any items will have invalid cost, store id or sku, they will be marked as failed and excluded from update list and \Magento\Catalog\Api\Data\PriceUpdateResultInterface[] with problem description will be returned. If there were no failed items during update empty array will be returned. If error occurred during the update exception will be thrown.
Delete product cost. In case of at least one of skus is not found exception will be thrown. If error occurred during the delete exception will be thrown.
Return product prices. In case of at least one of skus is not found exception will be thrown.

post.description: Add or update product's special price. If any items will have invalid price, store id, sku or dates, they will be marked as failed and excluded from update list and \Magento\Catalog\Api\Data\PriceUpdateResultInterface[] with problem description will be returned. If there were no failed items during update empty array will be returned. If error occurred during the update exception will be thrown.

Delete product's special price. If any items will have invalid price, store id, sku or dates, they will be marked as failed and excluded from delete list and \Magento\Catalog\Api\Data\PriceUpdateResultInterface[] with problem description will be returned. If there were no failed items during update empty array will be returned. If error occurred during the delete exception will be thrown.
Return product's special price. In case of at least one of skus is not found exception will be thrown.

Add or update product prices. If any items will have invalid price, price type, website id, sku, customer group or quantity, they will be marked as failed and excluded from update list and \Magento\Catalog\Api\Data\PriceUpdateResultInterface[] with problem description will be returned. If there were no failed items during update empty array will be returned. If error occurred during the update exception will be thrown.

put.description: Remove existing tier prices and replace them with the new ones. If any items will have invalid price, price type, website id, sku, customer group or quantity, they will be marked as failed and excluded from replace list and \Magento\Catalog\Api\Data\PriceUpdateResultInterface[] with problem description will be returned. If there were no failed items during update empty array will be returned. If error occurred during the update exception will be thrown.

post.description: Delete product tier prices. If any items will have invalid price, price type, website id, sku, customer group or quantity, they will be marked as failed and excluded from delete list and \Magento\Catalog\Api\Data\PriceUpdateResultInterface[] with problem description will be returned. If there were no failed items during update empty array will be returned. If error occurred during the update exception will be thrown.
Return product prices. In case of at least one of skus is not found exception will be thrown.

sales-data-order-interface.description: Order interface. An order is a document that a web store issues to a customer. Magento generates a sales order that lists the product items, billing and shipping addresses, and shipping and payment methods. A corresponding external document, known as a purchase order, is emailed to the customer.

comments.description: Array of any invoice comments. Otherwise, null.

sales-data-invoice-comment-search-result.description: Invoice comment search result interface. An invoice is a record of the receipt of payment for an order. An invoice can include comments that detail the invoice history.

sales-data-creditmemo-comment-search-res.description: Credit memo comment search result interface. After a customer places and pays for an order and an invoice has been issued, the merchant can create a credit memo to refund all or part of the amount paid for any returned or undelivered items. The memo restores funds to the customer account so that the customer can make future purchases. A credit memo usually includes comments that detail why the credit memo amount was credited to the customer.

sales-data-creditmemo-comment-interface.description: Credit memo comment interface. After a customer places and pays for an order and an invoice has been issued, the merchant can create a credit memo to refund all or part of the amount paid for any returned or undelivered items. The memo restores funds to the customer account so that the customer can make future purchases. A credit memo usually includes comments that detail why the credit memo amount was credited to the customer.

sales-data-creditmemo-interface.description: Credit memo interface. After a customer places and pays for an order and an invoice has been issued, the merchant can create a credit memo to refund all or part of the amount paid for any returned or undelivered items. The memo restores funds to the customer account so that the customer can make future purchases.

base_discount_tax_compensation_amount.description: Credit memo base discount tax compensation amount.

base_shipping_discount_tax_compensation_.description: Credit memo base shipping discount tax compensation amount.

comments.description: Array of any credit memo comments. Otherwise, null.

sales-data-creditmemo-item-interface.description: Credit memo item interface. After a customer places and pays for an order and an invoice has been issued, the merchant can create a credit memo to refund all or part of the amount paid for any returned or undelivered items. The memo restores funds to the customer account so that the customer can make future purchases. A credit memo item is an invoiced item for which a merchant creates a credit memo.

base_cost.description: The base cost for a credit memo item.

base_discount_amount.description: The base discount amount for a credit memo item.

After a customer places and pays for an order and an invoice has been issued, the merchant can create a credit memo to refund all or part of the amount paid for any returned or undelivered items. The memo restores funds to the customer account so that the customer can make future purchases.

import-csv-api-data-localized-source-dat.description: {@inheritdoc} Adds locale field in source data

import_multiple_value_separator.description: Import's Multiple Value Field Separator for CSV

inventory-api-data-source-search-results.description: Search results of Repository::getList method Used fully qualified namespaces in annotations for proper work of WebApi request parser

inventory-api-data-source-interface.description: Represents physical storage, i.e. brick and mortar store or warehouse Used fully qualified namespaces in annotations for proper work of WebApi request parser

enabled.description: If source is enabled. For new entity can be null

region_id.description: Region id if source has registered region.

region.description: Region title if source has custom region

use_default_carrier_config.description: Is need to use default config

inventory-api-data-source-carrier-link-i.description: Represents relation between some physical storage and shipping method Used fully qualified namespaces in annotations for proper work of WebApi request parser

inventory-api-data-stock-search-results-.description: Search results of Repository::getList method Used fully qualified namespaces in annotations for proper work of WebApi request parser

inventory-api-data-stock-interface.description: Represents product aggregation among some different physical storages (in technical words, it is an index) Used fully qualified namespaces in annotations for proper work of WebApi request parser

inventory-api-data-stock-extension-inter.description: TODO: temporal fix of extension classes generation during installation ExtensionInterface class for @see \Magento\InventoryApi\Api\Data\StockInterface

inventory-sales-api-data-sales-channel-i.description: Represents sales channels (which are a linkage between stocks and websites, customer groups, etc.) Used fully qualified namespaces in annotations for proper work of WebApi request parser

inventory-api-data-stock-source-link-sea.description: Search results of Repository::getList method Used fully qualified namespaces in annotations for proper work of WebApi request parser

inventory-api-data-stock-source-link-int.description: Represents relation between Stock and Source entities. Used fully qualified namespaces in annotations for proper work of WebApi request parser

inventory-api-data-source-item-search-re.description: Search results of Repository::getList method Used fully qualified namespaces in annotations for proper work of WebApi request parser

inventory-api-data-source-item-interface.description: Represents amount of product on physical storage Entity id getter is missed because entity identifies by compound identifier (sku and source_code) Used fully qualified namespaces in annotations for proper work of WebApi request parser

inventory-catalog-api-data-partial-inven.description: Specifies item and quantity for partial inventory transfer.

inventory-distance-based-source-selectio.description: DTO for latitude and longitude request

framework-extensible-data-interface.description: Interface for entities which can be extended with extension attributes.

inventory-export-stock-api-data-product-.description: Class ExportStockIndexDataResultInterface for result Inventory stock index dump export

inventory-sales-api-data-is-product-sala.description: Represents "is product salable for requested quantity" result interface.

inventory-in-store-pickup-api-data-searc.description: Search results for providing pickup locations.

inventory-in-store-pickup-api-data-picku.description: Represents sources projection on In-Store Pickup context. Realisation must follow immutable DTO concept. Partial immutability done according to restriction of current Extension Attributes implementation.

inventory-in-store-pickup-api-data-searc.description: Endpoint used to search Pickup Locations by different parameters: - by attribute filters fields @see \Magento\InventoryInStorePickupApi\Api\Data\SearchRequest\FiltersInterface - by distance to the address @see \Magento\InventoryInStorePickupApi\Api\Data\SearchRequest\AreaInterface Also, endpoint supports paging and sort orders.

Filter by Distance to the Address. Pickup Locations will be filtered by distance according to the geo-position of the entered address. Required fields for the address are country and one of the field: region or city or postcode.
Filter to filter by Fields. Each field may be filtered with different condition type. Supported condition types restricted by @see \Magento\Framework\Api\SearchCriteriaInterface

inventory-source-selection-api-data-sour.description: Data Interface representing particular Source Selection Algorithm

inventory-source-selection-api-data-inve.description: Request products in a given Qty and StockId

inventory-source-selection-api-data-item.description: Represents requested quantity for particular product

inventory-source-selection-api-data-addr.description: Data interface for shipping source or shipping destination

inventory-source-selection-api-data-sour.description: Result of how we will deduct product qty from different Sources
Represents source selection result for the specific source and SKU

qty_to_deduct.description: Quantity which will be deducted for this source

inventory-in-store-pickup-sales-api-data.description: Operation result object that contains status of the operation.

inventory-low-quantity-notification-api-.description: Represents a Source Item Configuration object Used fully qualified namespaces in annotations for proper work of WebApi request parser

adobe-stock-asset-api-data-asset-interfa.description: Adobe Stock Asset data class interface

adobe-stock-asset-api-data-category-inte.description: Adobe Stock asset Category data class

asynchronous-operations-data-detailed-bu.description: Interface BulkStatusInterface Bulk summary data with list of operations items full data.

operation_count.description: Total number of operations scheduled in scope of this bulk

asynchronous-operations-data-bulk-operat.description: Interface BulkStatusInterface Bulk summary data with list of operations items summary data.

operations_list.description: List of operation with statuses (short data).

operation_count.description: Total number of operations scheduled in scope of this bulk

asynchronous-operations-data-summary-ope.description: Getter Class OperationsStatusInterface Instead of OperationInterface this class don't provide all operation data and not responsive to set any data, just to get operation data without serialized_data and result_serialized_data

asynchronous-operations-data-operation-s.description: Bulk operation search result interface. An bulk is a group of queue messages. An bulk operation item is a queue message.
